item.title: Centos 升级gcc
item.description: 通过yum替换系统gcc为最新版本 检查当前系统gcc版本 1 2 3 4 5 # gcc --version gcc (GCC) 4.8.5 20150623 (Red Hat 4.8.5-28) Copyright (C) 2015 Free Software Foundation, Inc. This is free software; see the source for copying conditions. There is NO warranty; not even for MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS
